text: The USS Arizona Memorial is in Pearl Harbor, Hawaii. It is to remember the sailors killed when Pearl Harbor was attacked on December 7, 1941 by the Japanese. During the attack 1,177 sailors were killed on the USS Arizona. The memorial is located on top of the sunken USS Arizona. People can walk over the ship to look at it. Category:United States Navy Category:Buildings and structures in Hawaii Category:Military monuments and memorials in the United States Category:National Memorials of the United States Category:Honolulu
title: USS Arizona Memorial
